documentType: bureau of prisons count sheet and inmate roster
summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons count sheets and an inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 9-10, 2019. It records inmate counts by housing unit and includes a roster showing inmates assigned to suicide watch. The documents are administrative records from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

persons.name: Bullock

events.title: Inmates Placed on Suicide Watch
events.description: Four inmates (Bullock, Decapua, Gama-Pineda, McDuffie) are listed on the inmate roster as being assigned to suicide watch.

events.title: Official Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Bureau of Prisons count sheet records an official inmate count at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, showing a total of 758 inmates.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The documents are dated August 9-10, 2019, which is the period immediately following Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
An inmate roster shows four inmates (Bullock, Decapua, Gama-Pineda, McDuffie) were on suicide watch assignment as of August 9, 2019.
The count sheet records a total inmate population of 758 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms for inmate counts and assignments.
The forms include multiple official count slips requiring staff signatures, indicating standard prison operational procedures.
